title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Course Content Communication in business: communication and organizational effectiveness; formal and informal communication systems; communication networks and communication technology; Written: Effective business writing (style, wordusage, organization, mechanics, and forms) for specific purposes; business report writing, meeting, agendas and minutes; employment-process communication (cover letter, resume, follow up writing); Oral: Speaking and listening skills; conversation skills, interview and group discussion skills; public presentation (research, organization and delivery); business etiquette and protocol; Nonverbal and technical: voice and delivery, body language basics, emails and web pages.
